name: Threadbound
description:
[Created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam]

Solve puzzles as Weaver, a sorceress who can harness forbidden arts to manipulate entities by binding their fates together. Controls are explained in-game, but pressing P will skip levels.

Credits:

Programmers: goldey2, pynl

Artist and Level Designer: ChocolateCollie

Artist: Vil

Composer and Audio Designer: treatyofparis (Ian He)

Special thanks to Cactiquill

Software Used:

Visual Studio

Monogame

Ogmo

paint.net

Adobe Illustrator

Ableton Live 11

Sfxr

Soundtrack: Soundcloud
